summary: A young woman from a family of prostitutes falls in love with a hard-working man, but when he finds out the truth about her background, their romance becomes jeopardized.
cast: Ginger Rogers|Joel McCrea|Marjorie Rambeau|Henry Travers|Miles Mander|Queenie Vassar|Joan Carroll|Vivienne Osborne|Carmen Morales|Ernie Adams|Mara Alexander|Bobby Barber|Louise Beavers|Ray Cooke|Herbert Corthell|Jacqueline Dalya|Edgar Dearing|Jack Gardner|Jack Gargan|Lawrence Gleason Jr.|Charlie Hall|Grace Hayle|Robert Emmett Keane|Donald Kerr|Charles Lane|Larry McGrath|Matt McHugh|Frank Mills|Gene Morgan|Nestor Paiva|Bob Perry|Lorin Raker|Charles Williams
director: Director: Gregory La Cava (as Gregory LaCava)
title: Una nueva Primavera
